dialogue.speaker: Pointy-Haired Boss
dialogue.text: This is a very fancy place, Dogbert, so don't embarrass me.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.text: I'm afraid, monsieur, that jackets are required.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.text: You may wear these complimentary house jackets while you dine.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.text: You must also wear these beaver hats and clown feet.

dialogue.speaker: Waiter
dialogue.text: Next time messieurs will remember their jackets.

dialogue.speaker: Pointy-Haired Boss
dialogue.text: Looks like we narrowly avoided embarrassment.
